timestamp: # AWARDS_TT.csv — TT Distribution Ledger for LC01 GSE Equipment and Tooling
# This file is populated at KNOT closure with actual TT distributions.
# Each row represents a reward allocation to a KNU contributor.
#   delta_residual_primary      - Direct residual reduction attributed to KNU
#   delta_residual_adjacent_sum - Spillover impact sum across adjacent KNOTs
#   tx_id                       - Transaction ID for ledger reference
# This ledger feeds into finance/ledger.json for hash chain integrity.
